2.3.name: wordpress/purple-pastels
2.3.description: A flexible WordPress theme with a dropdown horizontal menu & vertical sidebar. The theme supports 8 widget-ready areas (2 in 3 different sidebars and 2 in custom page templates), featured images and threaded comments.  Includes page without comments and single column page templates; a print stylesheet and a login form widget. Toggle display options via the theme's options page. Translation ready. Support available at http://forum.quirm.net.
